institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: National Human Resources Development Consortium Operating Rules/Article 19 (Implementation of Joint Training Center Fees)
contents: Article 19 (Implementation of joint training center charges) If the joint training center does not pay part or all of the charges according to Annex 1, “Support Details for Joint Training Centers” by the deadline set by the Corporation, the Chairman shall The subsidy must be reduced according to the ratio corresponding to the relevant amount, or if subsidy has already been received, it must be refunded.
